name: the Lemminqs Condensate
description:
Developed during a GamesNow! game jam "Inside a quantum computer"
https://itch.io/jam/games-now-online-jam-4

Cool down your Lemminqs to reach a Lemminqs condensate that you are able to control with just moving the hatch and the door -- try to maximize the plot size on the right.

After the Lemminqs have mostly landed, hit SPACE to start. 
Use A, D for the hatch and left and right keys for the door. ESC to exit.
You may run the simulation over and over again, just press SPACE.

Version 1.0:
The game is not optimized for any size screen, but maybe pick 1280x768
Music to be added, possibly more Lemminqs and some functionalities to make it look more fancy..
